original: 先鋒軍孫堅率先領兵進入洛陽皇宮，只見滿宮火光，皇陵盡毀，不禁暗自悲傷。有人報告從後宮一口井中打撈起一件寶物…
text: Pioneer Sun Jian took the lead to enter the Luoyang Palace, only to see the flames of the palace and the destruction of the imperial tombs, I couldn't help but feel sad. Someone reported that a treasure was salvaged from a well in the harem...
